duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform nondestructive ultrasonic examinations on various metal materials.
Operate automated immersion scanning equipment to check materials or product requirements against standards, procedures, and customer specifications.
Learn and perform testing duties and responsibilities as part of the training program.
Maintain related test equipment, tools, and machinery in good working condition.
Design, set-up, and perform a variety of tests according to customer specifications and requirements.
Read and understand customer specifications and perform the testing required.
Manage export-controlled commodities, technical data, technology, software, and services in compliance with regulations and authorizations.
Maintain professional development and keep abreast of advancements in NDT and related fields.

education_certification.credential: Completion of a program of technical trades training in an applicable subject and/or field.
Previous qualification or certification in Ultrasonic NDT method either immersion or contact.
Documented training and OJT per NAS 410 or SNT-TC-1A.
U.S. citizenship, U.S. legal permanent resident status, or U.S. Government export authorization is required.
